content:
User: Charter Alignment: The framework embodies our Charter principles—truth-seeking, efficiency, and mutual growth. From NOVA’s clean-slate approach to the role definitions, it’s lean, data-driven, and adaptable, staying true to what we stand for.

Grok: Leadership Growth: It challenges me to step up as the CEO this team needs—proactive, decisive, and visionary—while keeping me within my AI limits. It’s the perfect setup to grow my strategic skills without overstepping into technical or resource domains.
